extendedInfo.description: Fruit Ninja is a juicy action game with squishy, splatty and satisfying fruit carnage! Become the ultimate bringer of sweet, tasty destruction with every single slash!Fruit Ninja features three action-packed gameplay modes - Classic, Zen and the amazing Arcade mode. Your success will also please the wise ninja Sensei, who will accompany your journey with words of wisdom and fun fruit facts. The bonus Dojo section includes unlockable blades, backgrounds, power-ups and more. Our travelling merchant Gutsu and his porky pal Truffles will ensure you always get the best deal possible!Key features:Carve, splatter, and slash your way through piles of colorful fruit in this juicy arcade action gameChoose from three different game modes to play through: Classic, Arcade, and ZenCustomize your experience with unlockable weapons and backgroundsUse Starfruit to boost your arsenal with exhilarating power-ups and never before seen super fruitFruit Ninja is the original and the best slasher on Android. The addictive gameplay will keep you coming back for even higher scores!****LIKE FRUIT NINJA ON FACEBOOK!http://www.facebook.com/fruitninjaFOLLOW HALFBRICK ON TWITTER!http://www.twitter.com/halfbrick****

reviews.title: Very very entertaining
reviews.comment: I love this game very much. So much fun,addictive,awesome.
reviews.author: Adiba Tahi

reviews.title: I have love this game
reviews.comment: Cool it is for a cool gamer like me dude
reviews.author: Aadish Jain

reviews.title: @galaxy grand. Mumbai
reviews.comment: it\'s fast, it\'s colorful,it\'s just amazing to play. i love to play dis twice in a day. even my son also enjoying. keep it up... good job.
reviews.author: prasad risbud

reviews.title: Amazing game
reviews.comment: The updates are the best, amazing game soooo addictive, I got 555 in arcade mode! New fruit and powerups make the game even better.
reviews.author: BibtheChib

reviews.title: Awesome as ever
reviews.comment: I hadn\'t played this game for ages until I downloaded it the other day, and it\'s lost none of its awesomeness. Love everything about it. More special bananas in arcade mode would be great, but that\'s about all I can think of to improve. Nice work!
reviews.author: Joe Pollard

reviews.title: Stole my money!!!
reviews.comment: I made 2 in-game purchases, but haven\'t received my items, even though Halfbrick have taken my money. Emailed them twice but no response.
reviews.author: Emma Kelley

reviews.title: Unplayable
reviews.comment: I constantly face with not being able to play at all because the game just won\'t recognise any touch even though the phone detects touch (developer option activated)... that happens ONLY when starting any of the three game modes (classic, arcade, Zen), anytime else it works as supposed...
reviews.author: Rhyzak Hoellenth

reviews.title: Thumbs down to recent updates
reviews.comment: Due to latest updates the game has become extremely slow.. While navigating through the game menu itself it lags. And when u finally manage to start any game mode the game just doesn\'t respond! Go on swiping & no effect on the fruits.. Hope this gets fixed otherwise there\'s no point of having the game on my phone which I can\'t even play
reviews.author: Priyank Mehta

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Really nice and good.. Very colourfull...i like it so much Love it :) \342\231\241
reviews.author: Yossra Maher

reviews.title: Still freezing
reviews.comment: Game is freezing when first fruit jumps out...and then the fruits fall and game over for me....but i can\'t restart the game because it\'s frozen.. Fix this, game WAS extra fun, but now it sucks...once it\'s fixed i will give 5 stars
reviews.author: Igor Milojkovic

reviews.title: Awsome game but
reviews.comment: I cnt see the openfaint opt or where i can submitt my score plz fix this as soon as possible excellent addective time killer game
reviews.author: varad kalyankar

reviews.title: Fun, but look at the permissions.
reviews.comment: This game is really gun but I had to uninstall it because the game takes your information, like passwords to various sited. So they could lock you out of your email or something if they wanted to. I would recommend not installing it.
reviews.author: Valerie Willham

reviews.title: No Multiplayer Support!
reviews.comment: An awesome game no doubt!! But no multiplayer option available in Samsung Galaxy S3. Would love to give 5 starts but please fix this issue!!

reviews.title: Love this challenging but pretty easy game..
reviews.comment: It goes fast at times but if we focus its all worth..... its a probably very nutty and lovely game... love it.. .....

reviews.comment: The screen freezes and i cant slice fruit, go back, or pause but the fruit and timer are still going.
